definition: to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: The sale is intented to clear old stock.
sentences.chinese: 這次減價銷售目的是售出存貨。

sentences.english: A: There’s a big sale on clothes and sporting goods at Riverside Mall.
sentences.chinese: 河畔購物中心的衣服和運動器材大減價。

sentences.english: Let me tell you, today is the last day for cheapening.
sentences.chinese: 我告訴你，今天是這次減價的最後一天。

sentences.english: B：Sir, these pants were on sale.
sentences.chinese: 先生，這些褲子是減價賣的。

sentences.english: You can cut the price down also, so don\\\\\\\'t believe the first price that people give you.--Ryan
sentences.chinese: 你也能夠減價，因爲不相信人們給您的最初成本。

sentences.english: Come and take a look in person during the sale of Huaxing.
sentences.chinese: 在華星大減價期間親自來看看吧。

sentences.english: I usually buy wool dress slacks after Christmas, when they go on sale at department stores.
sentences.chinese: 我通常會在聖誕節過後百貨店減價時買些毛料休閒褲。

sentences.english: The store discounted all clothing for sale.
sentences.chinese: 該店的服裝全部減價出售。

sentences.english: Don't just pick whatever's on sale or what looks like it might be comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 不要只選大減價的或者看起來可能舒服的那些。

sentences.english: A smarter approach to mark-down management is just the icing on the cake.
sentences.chinese: 更巧妙的減價管理辦法不過是錦上添花。

sentences.english: The goose down quilt is on sale today in this store.
sentences.chinese: 今天這家商店裏的鵝絨被子減價。

sentences.english: I heard other stores were having great mark-downs onthisitem.
sentences.chinese: 聽說別家的東西在大減價。

sentences.english: All the textile prices have been marked down.
sentences.chinese: 所有的紡織品都減價了。

sentences.english: We can make the price lower if you would order abit more.
sentences.chinese: 如果你單子下多一點兒，我們可以減價。

sentences.english: At Weber's department store. It was on sale.
sentences.chinese: 在魏伯百貨公司，那是在大減價。

sentences.english: The special air fare discount will be blacked out by the airlines over the holiday weekend.
sentences.chinese: 假日週末航班機票臨時減價將被取消。

definition: to quote a price/seller's first offer
to adjust downwards/to lower (prices, wages etc)
to demote/to pass down to a lower unit
